wordpressPage.title: Centurians
wordpressPage.content:
Equipment: Two cushions and two rolled up and taped newspaper batons

This is a game for pairs. Each person in the pair is given a cushion which must be balanced on the palm of one hand and a taped up newspaper baton which they must hold in the other.

Once you yell ‘Go’ the first person to knock their opponents cushion off without losing theirs first wins

Why not do this as a tournament?
